backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining dating profiles, matches, chats, signaling data, and profile CRUD with access‑controlled queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of frontend files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining theme variables, light/dark palettes, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry loading the PWA manifest, icons, pre-boot script, and React app root.
frontend/public/entry-loader.js: Pre-boot script that disables service workers, clears caches, blocks new registrations, and provides a mount watchdog and global error handler.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, display mode, and icons.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with styled bilingual messaging and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker that immediately activates, deletes all caches, unregisters itself, and bypasses fetch handling for debugging.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, online status, navigation, mobile number gating, and match/chat flow.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing header, navigation drawer, authentication controls, language toggle, and footer around page content.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches fatal React errors and displays a reload prompt with optional error details.
frontend/src/components/ItsAMatchModal.t: Modal shown when two users match, displaying profile avatars and allowing starting a chat or continuing to swipe.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Dropdown UI to switch between English and Nepali using the i18n provider.
frontend/src/components/OfflineState.tsx: Simple offline screen showing an alert when the user has no internet connection.
frontend/src/components/PhoneNumberPromp: Modal prompting the user to optionally save a phone number, with save and skip actions tied to profile updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state, creating AuthClient instances, and exposing identity and login helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks and returns the browser’s current online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePendingPhoneNumber: Handles saving a pending phone number to localStorage and automatically persisting it to the user profile when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles, matches, signaling messages, and performing like/reject actions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoCall.ts: Implements WebRTC video call setup, signaling, media handling, and call state management for chat-based calls.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state, translation lookup, and persistence via localStorage for the app’s i18n system.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains English translation keys and strings used throughout the application’s UI.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and base UI rules including gradients and video element defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/Chat.tsx: Chat screen handling messaging, scrolling, and video call states between matched users.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Displays swipe-style profile browsing with like/pass actions and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/InstallHelp.tsx: Provides installation instructions for Android and iOS with collapsible sections and benefits list.
frontend/src/pages/Matches.tsx: Shows list of user matches with profile previews and allows selecting a match to start chatting.
frontend/src/pages/MobileNumberEntry.tsx: Simple form for entering or skipping mobile number setup to continue onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: User profile editor loading existing data, allowing full profile updates, and saving changes.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Renders the settings page with language selection, phone number display and editing, account info, and logout functionality using i18n and Internet Identity hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Displays a welcome screen with feature cards and an Internet Identity login button, using i18n for text.
frontend/src/utils/chatId.ts: Computes a deterministic ChatId by sorting two principals and returning them in consistent order.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from URLs, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project’s overall state, requirements, known issues, and feature specifications for development planning.
